meanings.definition: Lacking consideration or care for others.
meanings.sent1: She made a thoughtless comment that hurt his feelings.
meanings.sent2: He often acts thoughtless towards his classmates.
meanings.sent3: Her thoughtless behavior at the party caused a lot of drama.
meanings.sent4: The thoughtless decision to drive without a seatbelt led to an accident.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his thoughtless actions were severe.

meanings.definition: Done without careful consideration or thought.
meanings.sent1: His thoughtless mistake cost the team the game.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her thoughtless purchase after seeing the high price.
meanings.sent3: The thoughtless error in the report was quickly corrected.
meanings.sent4: The thoughtless choice to skip breakfast made him feel weak later.
meanings.sent5: The thoughtless decision to ignore the warning signs was risky.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of thought or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The thoughtless graffiti on the wall was quickly removed.
meanings.sent2: He received a thoughtless gift that he didn't like.
meanings.sent3: Her thoughtless response to the question surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The thoughtless design of the building made it difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The thoughtless remark left an awkward silence in the room.
